title: Development Update — Demo 1 Still in Progress
content: The Sabotaged Sessions team is hard at work finalizing Demo 1: Weeks 1 & 2. Expect more previews, art updates, and behind-the-scenes content soon. Demo is not released yet.

title: Art reworks incoming
content: Crimson is finishing a background pass for Week 2. We reworked lighting and some character poses.
